title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, April 22, 2022
description: "Two things fill the mind with ever-increasing wonder and awe ... the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me." – Immanuel Kant, born on this day in 1724.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Two things fill the mind with ever-increasing wonder and awe ... the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me." – Immanuel Kant, born on this day in 1724.
